title: Donald Trump rejects CIA Russia hacking report
text: Donald Trump says a CIA report that Russian hackers tried to help him win the election is 'ridiculous' and politically-driven.

title: Dario Gradi: Crewe Alexandra director suspended pending FA investigation
text: Crewe director Dario Gradi is suspended pending an FA investigation into claims he 'smoothed over' a complaint of sexual assault in the 1970s.

title: Qantas to fly from London to Australia non-stop
text: Passengers will be able to fly from the UK to Australia non-stop from March 2018, says airline Qantas.

title: Chelsea 1-0 West Bromwich Albion
text: Chelsea move back to the top of the table and make it nine successive league wins as Diego Costa scores the winner against West Brom.

title: Früher und später Schock für Schalke
text: Stefan Kießling hat Bayer Leverkusen einen wichtigen Sieg im Kampf um die Europapokal-Plätze in der Fußball-Bundesliga beschert. Mit seinem Kopfball-Treffer in der 89.
